content: प्रवर्तित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Caused to turn, made to go or roll onwards, revolving; <ls>R. 9. 66.</ls> {@--2@} Founded, set up, established. {@--3@} Prompted, incited, instigated. {@--4@} Kindled; <ls>R. 5. 37.</ls> {@--5@} Caused, made. {@--6@} Purified, rendered pure; <ls>Ms. 11. 196.</ls> {@--7@} Informed.
